Created an attachment (id=38761)
design with scripts

Since varible "color" is declared in onPrepare script, it's out of scope in onCreate, so it's not accessible. Instead, "color" should be declared as a global varible by following script:

registerGlobal("color", "green");

According to the spec, these scripts should not work though they do work in previous version, engine has corrected the behavior.

However, this bug does make sense. Thanks, Rock.

Verified.

My test is updated with the new implementation and requirement.
